doc.title: Wikipedia: Kit-Cat Klock
doc.abstract: The Kit-Cat Klock is an art deco novelty wall clock shaped like a grinning cat with cartoon eyes that swivel in time with its pendulum tail.

doc.title: Wikipedia: Kit-Cat Glock
doc.abstract: The Kit-Cat Glock is an art deco novelty wall clock shaped like a grinning cat with cartoon eyes that swivel in time with its pendulum tail.
